title: Homeserver schema
description: Helpful JSON Schema to validate and configure your self-hosted homeserver

gid.description:
Host user's group ID
Obtainable via `id -g`

x-cert-manager.description:
Automatic TLS certificate provisioning configuration
Depends on cert-manager

rootService.description: The service to serve on the root domain

extraAnnotations.description: Extra annotations to add to the Ingress resource

secretRef.description: Name of the secret containing the WireGuard configuration

mediaCleanup.description:
Media cleanup job configuration
This job will remove empty directories that possibly only contain metadata files

scheduleCron.description: How often to run the cleanup job (cron)

dryRun.description: Whether to run in dry-run mode (only report which folders would be deleted)

paths.description: List of media directories to watch

maxDepth.description: Maximum directory depth level to scan

metadataFileGlobs.description: List of file globs considered as metadata files

enableServiceLinks.description: Whether information about services should be injected into pod's environment variables

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Whether to mount Service Account token in pods

commonLabels.description: Common labels to add to all the deployed resources

commonAnnotations.description: Common annotations to add to all the deployed resources

jellyfin.description:
Jellyfin configuration. Supports multiple instances
https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin

exposed.description: Expose the service publicly via ingress

name.description: Controls the names of the deployed k8s resources

livenessProbe.description:
Service liveness probe.
Overrides the global value.

readinessProbe.description:
Service readiness probe.
Overrides the global value.

startupProbe.description:
Service startup probe.
Overrides the global value.

strict.description: Enable strict security context (read-only fs & nonroot)

resourcesPreset.description:
Resources preset.
Set 'none' to disable resource limits for the service

automountServiceAccountToken.description:
Automount service account token.
Overrides the global value.

enableServiceLinks.description:
Enable service links.
Overrides the global value.

extraEnvSecrets.description: Extra environment variables populated from secrets

extraEnvFromCM.description: Extra environment variables populated from a config map

extraEnvFromSecret.description: Extra environment variables populated from a secret

extraLabels.description:
Extra labels.
Merges with the global value.

extraAnnotations.description:
Extra annotations.
Merges with the global value.

apiKey.description: go to Settings -> General and retrieve the API key
go to Settings -> General and retrieve the API key

installBookAndAdvancedHtmlOps.description: Install book and advanced HTML ops

cleanupArchiveReadDays.description: Number of days after which marking read items as removed; set to -1 to disable this feature

cleanupArchiveUnreadDays.description: Number of days after which marking unread items as removed; set to -1 to disable this feature

requireConfirmedEmail.description: Whether to require email confirmation for new users

search.description: Enable search. Ensure MeiliSearch is running
